content: double felted knit slippers leah barczykowski -pygmy_tiger_knits- modified from double slippers justine malone & doble tofler no 3 on ravelry yarn 2 skeins galway worsted by plymouth yarns co 72 72 74 78 78 80 80 84 88 needles place a stitch marker and join to knit in the round us 9 5 5mm 16 & dpns or magic loop method us 8 5mm 16 & dpns or magic loop method knit 18 18 18 19 19 20 20 21 22 place a locking stitch marker into the cast on stitch to mark gauge the halfway point later do not let it travel up your 16 sts x 24 row per 4 square using larger needles work measurements knit in stockinette stitch for 3 5 3 8 4 4 4 kids 8 75 9 8 10 25 11 11 8 4 6 5 5 4 5 8 6 women s 12 6 14 15 men s 16 5 before felting stop and count your row and make a note here ______ sizes kids 8/9 10 11/12 13/1 2/3 split for the feet women s 5/6 7/8 9/10 men s 11/12 remove marker knit the next 36 36 37 39 39 40 40 42 44sts place a marker 2 sts before the tips & tricks end remember you are the boss of your knitting be creative with these use scraps make stripes make using a darning needle and some scrap yarn place one a different color than the other the sky is the limit the next 36 36 37 39 39 40 40 42 44sts for extra fun needle felt designs or shapes on top of the on hold slippers after they ve been felted if you re worried about them being slippery you can always add some using the backwards loop method cast on 3 3 4 puff paint designs to the bottom for a better grip 4 5 5 6 6 8 sts you should have 39 39 41 pattern 43 44 45 46 48 52 sts joining to work in the using the long tail cast on round 1 leah barczykowski pygmy tiger knits ***when working the second foot this is where round 2 knit you will start after picking up stitches*** repeat the last two rounds until you have 24 sts knit 3 3 4 5 5 6 6 6 7 rounds total k1 ssk k1 2 2 2 3 3 4 4 6 k2tog knit to round 3 k2tog until the end of round 12 sts end round 4 *k2tog k1* repeat until end of round 8 knit 3 3 4 4 5 5 5 5 6 rounds sts remove markers as you go cut an 8 inch tail and thread through the remaining stitches and k1 ssk 1 0 0 0 1 1 2 2 4 k2tog knit to weave in the end end you should have 35 35 37 39 40 41 42 44 48 sts on your needle place a locking second foot
